conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through the baffles to predict which container it will flow into.
Identify the starting point of the liquid flow from point A.
The liquid will flow from point A through the baffles.
Determine the path of the liquid through the baffles.
The liquid will flow through the openings of the baffles.
Follow the path of the liquid through the baffles.
The liquid will flow from point A through the openings labeled B, C, and D.
Predict the final destination of the liquid.
Since the liquid flows through the openings labeled B, C, and D, it will flow into container E.
Verify the prediction by checking the flow path through the baffles and the final destination of the liquid.
